title: e-Golem
welcome-text: eGolem - online is a web product. It combines interactive web componenents, web technologies and web design to deliver artificial human - GOLEM as educational tool.
demo-text: See DEMO with capabilities in 2D, 3D graphics and virtual reality.
demo-mannequin-text: See the demo simulator controlling the HW mannequin.
not-logged-text: Please, sign in or sign up to  access themed textbook with simulator.
logged-text: Thanks for signing in. Simulators available.
about-text:
technology: The enabling technology is bodylight.js which delivers missing pieces to convert complex mathematocal model to a web simulator using web standards like WebAssembly, WebGL, HTML Canvas, etc. See details at bodylight.physiome.cz.

research: The research and development were funded by applied research grant of Czech republic mainly MÅ MT a MPO. The business development were funded or otherwise supported by City of Prague, other donation or commercially delivered services.

who we are We are group of people that reside at Institute of Pathophysiology at 1st faculty of medicine, Charles University and at the same time we sponsor some of our activities by spin-off company Creative Connections s.r.o.

mathematical models: Our simulators are based on scientific models, the complex www.physiomodel.org and more simple focusing more on few phenomenon based on library www.physiolibrary.org

If you want to cooperate in research (as University) or in business development (as spin-off company) please contact us using a form bellow, email (info@creativeconnections.cz) or join me via linkedin Tomas Kulhanek - LinkedIn Profile
